Uses of Interface
scope.Scope

  • Packages that use Scope 
    Package Description
    arrayGenerator
    ArrayGenerators are objects that generate arrays of integers.
    scope
    A scope defines a set of values - for example, a range of integers, or a set of characters.

    • Uses of Scope in arrayGenerator

      Fields in arrayGenerator declared as Scope 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Scope<T> ScopedArrayGenerator.scope 
      Methods in arrayGenerator that return Scope 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Scope<T> ScopedArrayGenerator.getScope()
      Get the scope used by this generator.
      Methods in arrayGenerator with parameters of type Scope 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) ScopedArrayGenerator<java.lang.Character> CharacterArrayGeneratorTest.getGenerator(Scope<java.lang.Character> scope)
      This class tests character array generators.
      (package private) ScopedArrayGenerator<java.lang.Integer> IntegerArrayGeneratorTest.getGenerator(Scope<java.lang.Integer> scope)
      This class tests integer array generators.
      (package private) abstract ScopedArrayGenerator<T> ScopedArrayGeneratorTest.getGenerator(Scope<T> scope)
      Implementing classes must implement this method to return the sort of ScopedArrayGenerator the implementing class is intended to test.
      (package private) void ScopedArrayGeneratorTest.testCoversRange(Scope<T> scope)
      Check that a generated array contains all the expected values.
      (package private) void ScopedArrayGeneratorTest.testWithinRange(Scope<T> scope, int size)
      Check that the array contents are within the specified range.

    • Uses of Scope in scope

      Classes in scope that implement Scope 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlphabetScope<T>
      Implements Scope, when the set (or alphabet) of possible values is specified by a Set.
      class  CharacterScope
      An implementation of an AlphabetScope for characters.
      class  IntegerScope
      Implements a scope of integers.
